column4: compiz won't startup when the system is loaded, I can loaded it once I am in a gdm session though, when I run 'compiz' from terminal it loads with all my settings in place, how do I repair it so that it starts from startup?
Install simple-ccsm and select Custom in Sys>Prefs>Appearance>Visual Effects tab
thnks

Firs thing I do: chmod -x $(which NetworkManager) :)
